scripts.dev: node -e "if (process.getuid() !== 0 && !process.env.DOCKER) { require('child_process').execSync('sudo -E tsx watch src/start-dev.ts', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } else { require('child_process').execSync('tsx watch src/start-dev.ts', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.start: node -e "if (process.getuid() !== 0 && !process.env.DOCKER) { require('child_process').execSync('sudo -E node dist/index.js', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } else { require('child_process').execSync('node dist/index.js', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
